name: 呂怜樺
objective:
Understanding international business management from the global perspective, students will learn the role of international monetary institutions as well as political and economic factor that influence foreign direct investments.。
In addition, this course provides insight into factors that influence internationalization, entry strategies into foreign markets such as exporting, licensing, joint-ventures and tools to manage and evaluate risks and changes of international operations. This course has an interdisciplinary approach by providing insights on how the international political environment affects business decisions such as internationalizing or global production. MBA students are very welcome to attend this course.
schedule:
W1  課程簡介(Introduction to our class)(0220)
W2  何謂國際企業(What is international business?) (0227)
W3  市場的全球化與企業國際化(Market globalization and internationalized) (0305)
W4  國際商務之文化環境(International culture environment) (0312)
W5  國際商務之文化環境(International culture environment) (0319)
W6  國際企業倫理與社會責任(International ethics and social responsibility) (0326)
W7  清明節連假(No class)(0402)
W8  第一次個案報告(1st case study)(0409)
W9  第二次個案報告(2nd case study)(0416)
W10 第三次個案報告(3rd case study)(0423)
W11 全球策略與組織(Global strategic planning and organization (0430)
W12 出口與相對貿易/海外直接投資(Export and countertrade/ FDI) (0507)
W13 海外市場的進入與策略聯盟(Oversea entry strategy and strategic alliances) (0514)
W14 海外市場的進入與策略聯盟(Oversea entry strategy and strategic alliances) (0521)
W15 全球尋購(Global sourcing) (0528)
W16 全球人力資源管理(Human resources in global market) (0604)
W17 新興市場(Emerging market and internationalized)(0611)
W18 期末考週(Final exam by writing)(0618)
scorePolicy: ※平時成績：30% ※上課小考或期中報告:30% ※期末考或學期報告:40% (Participation 30%, Midterm- exam, presentation:30%, Final-exam-40%)
materials:
1. Global Business Today. Charles W.L. Hill/G.Thomas M. Hult. 10th Edition. Mcgraw-Hill education. 
2. International Business, The New Realities. S.Tamer Cavusgil. Gary Knight, Joh R. Riesenberger. Pearson.
3. 上課講義以及個案探討。(Course teaching and case study)
